data.prayer: Father, encourage the 443 believers in Tarrafal de São Nicolau to not just be consumers of knowledge but be producers of love, mercy, kindness, and justice.
data.verse: let us not love with words or speech but with actions and in truth.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Tarrafal de São Nicolau, Cape Verde
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Spirit, guide seekers in Tarrafal de São Nicolau, Cape Verde to the gospel through searching YouTube or TikTok today.
data.verse: I love those who love me, and those who seek me find me.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 11 lost neighbors

data.prayer: God, we pray both the men and women of Tarrafal de São Nicolau, Cape Verde will find ways to meet in groups of two or three to encourage and correct one another from your Word.

Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in Tarrafal de São Nicolau, Cape Verde. Show them that faithfulness is more important than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.
Lord, teach the young people in the state of Tarrafal de São Nicolau to trust your Word and find the path of purity.
data.verse: How can a young person stay on the path of purity? By living according to your word.

data.prayer: Father, we suspect there is 1 believer for every 11 neighbors who are far from you in Tarrafal de São Nicolau. Please, give courage and opportunity to your children to speak boldly.
data.verse: Pray also for me, that whenever I speak, words may be given me so that I will fearlessly make known the mystery of the gospel.

data.prayer: Spirit, please defend the 443 believers in Tarrafal de São Nicolau against self-centered spirituality. Open their eyes to the fields ripe for harvest around them.

data.focus_label: Tarrafal de São Nicolau, Cape Verde
data.section_summary:
the state of Tarrafal de São Nicolau, Cape Verde has a population of 5,300.

We estimate Tarrafal de São Nicolau has 443 people who might know Jesus, 4,112 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 744 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 11 neighbors who need Jesus.

location.full_name: Tarrafal de São Nicolau, Cape Verde
